Source.Name: lua51-filesystem
Source.Summary: LuaFileSystem library for the lua 5.1 runtime
Source.Description: LuaFileSystem is a Lua library developed to complement the set of functions related to file systems offered by the standard Lua distribution.

Package.Name: lua51-filesystem
Package.Summary: LuaFileSystem library for the lua 5.1 runtime
Package.Description: LuaFileSystem is a Lua library developed to complement the set of functions related to file systems offered by the standard Lua distribution.
